title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka - Pancharatna Collection
materials: meticulously handcrafted with a 'Hyderabad Polish' finish. Features a central
surrounded by brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Accented with freshwater pearls
features: Classic Jhumka design with a floral stud featuring a central Emerald. The tiered bell-shaped (Gopuram) design is intricately embellished with CZ stones, mimicking traditional Nakshi work. Delicately dangling freshwater pearls add a touch of grace and movement. The design blends traditional South Indian temple jewelry motifs with a modern, lightweight construction.
colors: Primarily gold with vibrant green Emerald accents and shimmering white CZ stones. The freshwater pearls provide a soft
occasions: and other festive occasions. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: A timeless design that embodies South Indian heritage and elegance. The vibrant Emerald adds a touch of royalty and sophistication. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The lightweight design provides comfortable wear. The 'Hyderabad Polish' enhances the gold's luster and provides a protective finish. Excellent value given the quality of materials and craftsmanship.
